org.dotplot.fmatrix
Class FMatrixManager

java.lang.Object
  org.dotplot.fmatrix.FMatrixManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
MonitorablePlotUnit
public class FMatrixManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements MonitorablePlotUnit

controller class for the x- and y-Dimension of the fmatrix and the bit matrix. This class represents the "interface"(entry class) to the fmatrix. All other classes in this package are controlled by this class.

Version:
0.4
Author:
Constantin von Zitzewitz, Thorsten Ruehl

addRegularExpressionType

public int addRegularExpressionType(java.lang.String regExp,
                                    double weighting)
the function allows to specify a group of types via an regular expression wich should have a special weight thus a group of tokentypes could be highlighted.

Parameters:
regExp - the regular expression describing the wanted types
weighting - the weight for the new type
Returns:
the index of the new regular-expression-type
